column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////So I hear LA pizza is crap. NY and Chicago are the places to go. I would concur with NY
column2: now it was time to see about Chicago. I looked at a few places for my trip and settled on Lou Malnati's based on several reviews and ratings. They have several locations and I'm sure the quality and experience can vary
column3: my choice was on Wells. I got a starter and a pizza.
